message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good deal!
I understand you want a larger share, but my offer considers the time value of money. This is a fair starting point for negotiation.
Considering the inflation, my offer is more generous than before. Take it before it devalues further!
Alice, we're running out of time and the money is losing value fast. This is my final offer, let's close the deal and get something!
